notes.rrsp_2023: User confirmed no RRSP contributions for 2023.

notes.tuition_fees_2023: User confirmed no post-secondary tuition fees for 2023. Previously identified amounts for children's programs are not eligible for tuition credit.
notes.margin_interest_2023: User stated margin interest should be in transactions, but script did not identify specific margin interest transactions. Pending official statements or specific transaction details from user.
